name: Runner
overview: Reach the end of the road without running out of lives. The road gradually gets narrower, and there are obstacles which you must avoid. Each level has a longer road to run along, with more obstacles to avoid. Every step you take earns you a point; every completed road earns 100 points. This game was developed and released for free by Masterware Entertainment on their itch.io page on August 18, 2018.
